# Open data

- **Neurosift**. Better search for DANDI, OpenNeuro and EMBER: <https://neurosift.app/>
- **EBRAINS**. Another open data repository: <https://search.kg.ebrains.eu/?category=Dataset>
- A nice DANDIset to browse: <https://dandiarchive.org/dandiset/001530/draft/files?location=001530/nwb-behaviour-processed-raw/PG028&page=1>
- **OpenScore databook**. Example from the Allen Institute of using DANDIsets for science: <https://alleninstitute.github.io/openscope_databook/intro.html>

# Spike Sorting

- SpikeInterface github page: <https://github.com/spikeinterface/spikeinterface/>
- Intro to SpikeInterface course: <https://chrishalcrow.github.io/intro_to_spikeinterface/>
- SpikeInterface docs: <https://spikeinterface.readthedocs.io/en/stable/>
- SpikeInterface-GUI: <https://github.com/spikeinterface/spikeinterface-gui>
